body.p: supports the translation of documents from and to the Thai language. This language is special in its character representation, character composition, word spacing, and writing order, therefore provides a Rich Text Format (RTF) editor that can process Thai language documents.

This RTFEdit editor is required for Thai documents, but can also be used for all other document formats supported by . In contrast, 's Standard editor supports all document formats except the Thai document format.
Another difference that you might notice: RTFEdit is a proportional fonts editor; the standard editor is a monospace fonts editor.
